attributes.action: Abolish all metropolitan councils and counties and bring back all the traditional county borders in England, Scotland and Wales
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The traditional counties have been devastated. Lancashire has been torn apart; Merseyside and Greater Manchester were invented and other parts were put into Cheshire and Yorkshire. In Yorkshire the historic Riding have been scrapped. Westmoreland and Cumberland were destroyed and put into "Cumbria" along with parts of North Lancashire. Most counties are also suffering from border changes e.g. part of Gloucestorshire was given to Worcestorshire.
